titles.title: A resolution commending the Huskies of the University of Connecticut for winning the 2004 Division I Men's and Women's NCAA Basketball Championships.
A resolution commending the Huskies of the University of Connecticut for winning the 2004 Division I Men's and Women's NCAA Basketball Championships.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

reference.label: text of measure as introduced in Senate

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Commends the University of Connecticut for: (1) winning the 2004 NCAA Division I Men's and Women's Basketball Championships; and (2) becoming the first school in the history of NCAA Division I basketball to win both the men's and women's national titles in the same year.
